pageTitle: Sunday, October 3, 2010 Baltimore Ravens - Pittsburgh Steelers Box Scores, Game Results & Summary - USATODAY.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {70125=Mendenhall ran the ball three times in four plays inside the 26-yard line and scored on a seven-yard sprint to the right pylon with 7:14 to play for a 14-10 Steeler lead., 69300=The Steelers (3-1) were seeking their first 4-0 start since 1979., 70308=Baltimore came right back with a drive that yielded a fresh set of downs inside the 10-yard line, but the Steelers' defense tightened and forced Flacco into three incompletions while stuffing Rice on second down for a turnover on downs with 2:40 to go.}
